name: Roll-Bot
description:
Made during Ludum Dare 51. The game jam theme was: Every 10s.

  • Link for Roll-Bot's Ludum Dare 51 page (rate us!)

Take control of the Roll-BOT, the last line of defense of #X140's Space Facility, and fight a swarm of spiked alien species from destroying the Facility.

Every 10s the Roll-Bot changes its form between an agile mobile ball and a static combat turret. Plan your actions according to the timer, use your surroundings and look for good positions to repel your foes.

HOW TO PLAY

Roll-BOT is a single-player action game that requires a mouse and keyboard to play.
